members.joinCircumstances: Founded the organization as a cover for his plan to take over Alabasta and obtain Pluton
Joined Baroque Works to gain access to Poneglyphs and pursue her research on the Void Century

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Betrays Robin - End of the Partnership
keyMoments.description: Crocodile stabs his Vice President, Nico Robin, with his poisoned hook after she reveals the Poneglyph doesn't mention Pluton. He declares she's no longer useful and admits he never trusted her during their four-year partnership in Baroque Works.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the effective end of Baroque Works' leadership structure and reveals the true nature of the organization as a tool for Crocodile's personal ambitions rather than a genuine partnership.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a crown and curled mustache

dissolutionReason: Crocodile's defeat by Luffy and arrest by the Marines led to the collapse of Baroque Works
